hero.title: Master English
hero.description: Learn English through interactive blogs and test your knowledge with quizzes. Take on challenges and level up your skills with fun tests designed to track your progress and help you grow faster on Edublog.

blogs.title: Explore Our Blogs
blogs.subtitle: Learn English the fun way with interactive blogs, quizzes, and challenges. Track your progress, unlock new levels, and improve your skills with every post.

result.title: Result Overview
result.description: Get insights into your test results with a breakdown of your performance.

Settings.title: Account Settings
Settings.description: View and update your personal information and account details.

password.title: Password Security
password.description: For your security, Changing your password regularly helps protect your account and personal information from unauthorized access.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Deleting your account is a permanent action and cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently erased and cannot be recovered.

info.title: Account Information
info.description: This section shows when your account was originally created and the most recent time you updated your profile details.

deleteAccount.cannotDeleteAdmin: This action is not permitted. Admin accounts are protected and cannot be deleted.
deleteAccount.title: Confirm Account Deletion
deleteAccount.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.warningMessage: This action is irreversible and will permanently remove your account and all associated data. To confirm, type delete in the field below.

TestsManagement.title: Tests Management
TestsManagement.adminDescription: View, edit, and manage all tests created by content creators.
TestsManagement.creatorDescription: View, edit, and manage your tests.

testPreview.title: Test Preview
testPreview.description: Try out the test to see how it works for learners.

deleteTest.title: Delete Test
deleteTest.description: Are you sure you want to delete the test '{title}'?
deleteTest.successDescription: The test has been successfully deleted.
deleteTest.errorDescription: There was an error deleting the test. Please try again.

deleteTests.title: Delete Tests
deleteTests.description: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected tests?
deleteTests.errorDescription: There was an error deleting the tests. Please try again.

BlogsManagement.title: Blogs Management
BlogsManagement.adminDescription: View, edit, and manage all blogs created by content creators.
BlogsManagement.creatorDescription: View, edit, and manage your blogs.

blogPreview.title: Blog Preview
blogPreview.description: Preview how your blog post will appear to readers.

deleteBlog.title: Delete Blog
deleteBlog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the blog '{title}'?
deleteBlog.successDescription: The blog has been successfully deleted.
deleteBlog.errorDescription: There was an error deleting the blog. Please try again.

deleteBlogs.title: Delete Blogs
deleteBlogs.description: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected blogs?
deleteBlogs.errorDescription: There was an error deleting the blogs. Please try again.
